panels.title: Archive Stats (10 second time window, Averaged Over ALL SMs)

panels.description:
Current rate (per second) of Atom objects written to a volume by the Storage Manager.
(NuoMon.ObjectsSaved/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Saves/sec

panels.description:
Current number of Atoms queued up waiting to be written to disk by the Storage Manager.
(NuoMon.ArchiveQueue/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Queue

panels.description:
Current rate (per second) of Atom objects have been loaded from a volume by a Storage Manager.
(NuoMon.ObjectsLoaded/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Loaded/sec

panels.description:
Current percentage of time spent finishing NuoDB Archive writes.
(NuoMon.ArchiveFsyncTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: FSync

panels.description:
Current percentage of time spent in NuoDB Archive directory operations.
(NuoMon.ArchiveDirectoryTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Directory

panels.description:
Current percentage of time spent writing to a NuoDB Archive.
(NuoMon.ArchiveWriteTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Write

panels.description:
Current percentage of time spent reading from a NuoDB Archive.
(NuoMon.ArchiveReadTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Read

panels.description:
Current percentage of time in archive synchronization throttle, which is used to slow down an SM to decrease interference with other work.
(NuoMon.ArchiveSyncThrottleTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Sync Throttle

panels.description:
Current percentage of time in NuoDB Archive I/O throttle which limits disk bandwidth consumption for writes, to leave some bandwidth for reads.
(NuoMon.ArchiveBandwidthThrottleTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Bandwidth Throttle

panels.description:
Current number of bytes written to a volume by the Storage Manager when storing Atoms.
(NuoMon.DiskWritten)
panels.title: Disk Bytes Written

panels.description:
Graph the rate of Atom objects that were LOADED or SAVED by Storage Manager Nodes.
(NuoMon.ObjectsLoaded)
(NuoMon.ObjectsSaved)
panels.title: Objects Saved / Read (per second)

panels.description:
Graph percentage of the time spent finishing NuoDB Archive writes.
(NuoMon.ArchiveFsyncTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: FSync Time

panels.description: Graph of maximum NuoDB Archive Queue size for each NuoDB SM process.
panels.title: Max Queue

panels.description:
Graph the number of bytes written to a volume by the Storage Manager when storing Atoms.
(NuoMon.DiskWritten)
panels.title: Bytes Written
Journal Stats (10 second time window, Averaged over ALL SMs)

panels.description:
Current percentage of time spent finishing journal writes.
(NuoMon.JournalFsyncTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: FSync

panels.description:
Current percentage of time spent in journal directory operations.
(NuoMon.JournalDirectoryTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Directory

panels.description:
Current percentage of time spent in journal write.
(NuoMon.JournalWriteTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Write

panels.description:
Current number of messages in a queue, waiting to be journaled.
(NuoMon.JournalQueue)
panels.title: Queue

panels.description:
Current number of bytes written to journal file.
(NuoMon.JrnlBytes)
panels.title: Disk Bytes Written

panels.description:
Current number of writes per second to the journal file.
(NuoMon.JrnlWrites)
panels.title: Writes

panels.description:
Graph maximum Journal Queue by each SM process.
(NuoMon.JournalQueue)
panels.title: Max Queue

panels.description:
Graph percentage of the time spent finishing NuoDB Journal writes.
(NuoMon.JournalFsyncTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: FSync Time
